alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 21 at 12:53PM PST until February 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the 20s. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Forecast temperatures will likely be very unusual for this time of year with daily record lows possible for much of the southern Oregon coastline. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
